data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Cusco, Peru. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cusco, Peru
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Cusco to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: the state of Cusco has (about) 168,777 people who know Jesus, 933,143 people who know about him culturally, and 69,580 people who are far from Jesus.
Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cusco. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Yora people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Cusco to exponentially multiply disciples.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Cusco, Peru.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 168,777 believers in Cusco, Peru desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.
